entry.title: The GoPro HERO5 action cameras and the Karma drone
entry.content: GoPro announced the new HERO5 Black and HERO5 Session action cameras a few days ago, and they also unveiled the Karma, a really cool drone to go with them. I spent some time playing with the new toys at their Photokina stand the other day, so head on over to Tools & Toys to see what they bring to the table.
